sqlMap.select: Select count(1) FROM T_Arrival_Deliver where $and{id = #id#} $and{branch_id = #branch_id#} $and{DateDiff("d",deliver_date, #receive_date_start#) < 0} $and{deliver_date <= dateadd("d",1,#receive_date_end#)} $and{deliver_number = #deliver_number#} $and{deliver_carno = #deliver_carno#} $and{car_no = #car_no#} $and{deliver_man = #deliver_man#} $and{warehousem_man = #warehousem_man#} $and{deliver_statue = #deliver_statue#} $and{deliver_barcode = #deliver_barcode#}
sqlMap.update: update T_Arrival_Deliver set id=#id# ,branch_id=#branch_id# ,deliver_date=#deliver_date# ,deliver_number=#deliver_number# ,deliver_carno=#deliver_carno# ,deliver_man=#deliver_man# ,warehousem_man=#warehousem_man# ,deliver_statue=#deliver_statue# ,deliver_barcode=#deliver_barcode# WHERE id = #id#
sqlMap.delete: delete FROM T_Arrival_Deliver WHERE id IN(#ids#)
